meta.title: AgileAiAgents Auto Project Orchestrator v1.0.0 - Automated End-to-End Project Creation

summary: This file enables automatic project orchestration. When Claude Code detects this file in the agile-ai-agents folder, it will automatically coordinate all 27 AgileAiAgents to take a project idea from concept to completion using agile methodology without requiring manual agent activation.

- **Decision Context**: All user decisions preserved with full rationale

Qualifying Questions Framework.content_preview: When a user provides a project idea, Claude will automatically ask these categories of questions:

Project Scope & Vision.content_preview:
- What is the main problem this project solves?
- Who are the target users?
- What are the core features that must be included?
- What features are ni...

Technical Constraints.content_preview:
- Do you have any technology preferences (languages, frameworks)?
- Are there any technologies you want to avoid?
- What's your experience level with ...

Repository & Code Management.content_preview:
- Will this project be added to a Git repository (GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket, Azure DevOps)?
- Do you have an existing repository or organization where...

Cloud Infrastructure & Deployment.content_preview:
- Do you have a preferred cloud provider (AWS, Google Cloud, Azure, Linode, DigitalOcean, etc.)?
- Do you have existing cloud accounts or credits with...

Project Constraints.content_preview:
- What's your target timeline for launch?
- Do you have a budget for tools, hosting, or services?
- Will this be a solo project or do you have a team?...

Business Context.content_preview:
- Is this a personal project, startup idea, or enterprise application?
- Do you need user authentication and user management?
- Will you need payment ...
